product: PbO powder (2232 mg, 10 mmol) was dissolved in 57% w/w aqueous HI solution (17 mL) in a 50 mL glass flask. The solution was heated and stirred constantly. A bright yellow solution resulted. Hexylamine (1000 μL, 7.52 mmol) was added to 50% H3PO2 (2 mL) slowly. Stirring was discontinued. The solution was cooled on a hot plate and eventually cooled to room temperature.
